meals.name: Breakfast
meals.preparation: Mix oats with milk, let sit overnight. Top with berries and almonds in the morning.

meals.name: Lunch
meals.ingredients: Chicken breast 150g, quinoa 100g, vegetables 200g, olive oil 10ml
meals.preparation: Grill chicken breast until internal temperature reaches 165°F. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Steam vegetables until tender. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and drizzle with olive oil.

meals.name: Dinner
meals.ingredients: Salmon 150g, sweet potato 200g, broccoli 150g, olive oil 10ml
meals.preparation: Preheat oven to 400°F. Season salmon with herbs and lemon. Place salmon and diced sweet potato on a baking sheet. Bake for 15-20 minutes. Steam broccoli separately. Serve together and drizzle with olive oil.

meals.name: Snacks
meals.ingredients: Greek yogurt 150g, mixed nuts 30g, apple 1 medium
meals.preparation: Eat yogurt, nuts, and apple throughout the day as needed to maintain energy levels.
